title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Quality Management and Organizational Learning Capacity Enhancement for Service Enterprises

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Understanding of Service Operations and Basic Quality Management Concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain three or more core quality management (QM) practices in service-oriented business environments
Learners can implement feedback system design processes to enhance organizational learning capabilities in VR simulation environments
Learners can analyze the correlation between quality management practices and organizational learning outcomes through case studies and produce written reports

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
